review: Great box. Works great as design, a streaming box with the installed apps.Other uses are limited:- USB won't connect to external hard drives to play movies- NAS movie playback is not great- XBMC runs great after unlocking it  - Some artifacts after 6 hours of useOverall, a great buy for anyone uses it as intended. Highly recommended.

review: This is equal parts wonderful and maddening.  When it plays, it's wonderful.  When it stops mid-episode and takes 1-15 minutes to re-load, you pretty much want to punt it through the nearest window.  Sometimes you can get through a full hour-long tv episode with not stopping, other times it will stop multiple times.  I keep it in the same room as the router, with only my husband & myself sitting in the love seat blocking it's path.
